actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to increase the number of U.S. district court judges and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for an increase in the number of United States district court judges. Increases salaries for judges of the Federal Courts and referees in bankruptcy proceedings (Amends 28 U.S.C. 133, 135).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to increase the number of U.S. district court judges and for other purposes.
